summary.para: Sets graphics processing unit (GPU) debug reference tracking options.

param.name: uOptions
param.para: A combination of -typed flags that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies tracking options. If a flag is present, the tracking option that the flag represents is set to "on"; otherwise the tracking option is set to "off."

returns.para: This method returns one of the Direct3D 11 return codes.

remarks.para: This API requires the Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.
